fields.headline: Waiting
fields.bodyText: Waiting is a repellent American comedy set in a small, suburban restaurant called ShenaniganZ where the staff loathe themselves almost as much as they despise the clients they serve. They put phlegm, pubic hair, sweat and dandruff into the food of offensive customers and play a game in which they surprise each other by exposing their genitals in ingenious ways. Avoid it unless you're on a diet or fasting.
